children.description: The content of the component, normally an `IconButton` or string.

classes.description: Override or extend the styles applied to the component.

component.description:
The component used for the root node.
Either a string to use a HTML element or a component.

disablePointerEvents.description:
Disable pointer events on the root.
This allows for the content of the adornment to focus the input on click.

disableTypography.description: If children is a string then disable wrapping in a Typography component.

position.description: The position this adornment should appear relative to the `Input`.

variant.description:
The variant to use.
Note: If you are using the `TextField` component or the `FormControl` component
you do not have to set this manually.

descriptions.root: Styles applied to the root element.
descriptions.filled: Styles applied to the root element if `variant="filled"`.
descriptions.positionStart: Styles applied to the root element if `position="start"`.
descriptions.positionEnd: Styles applied to the root element if `position="end"`.
descriptions.disablePointerEvents: Styles applied to the root element if `disablePointerEvents=true`.
descriptions.hiddenLabel: Styles applied if the adornment is used inside <FormControl hiddenLabel />.
descriptions.marginDense: Styles applied if the adornment is used inside <FormControl margin="dense" />.
